intervention_catalogue.name: Thinking Skills Programme
intervention_catalogue.short_description: Thinking Skills Programme (TSP) helps men and women to develop skills in pro-social problem solving, perspective taking, developing and managing relationships, and self-management. Suitable for all offences – for sexual offences, consider Horizon or Kaizen first.
long_description: Thinking Skills Programme (TSP) helps men and women to develop skills in pro-social problem solving, perspective taking, developing and managing relationships, and self-management. Suitable for all offences – for sexual offences, consider Horizon or Kaizen first.
intervention_catalogue.session_detail: 4 x one-to-one sessions and 15 x group sessions

possible_outcomes: Develop thinking (cognitive) skills to manage risk factors, develop protective factors, and achieve pro-social goals.

risk_consideration.cn_score_guide:
total score of 5+  OASys items 
2.6 - Recognises the impact and consequences of offending 
7.2 - Regular activities encourage offending 
11.4 - Temper control 
11.6 - Problem solving 
11.7 - Awareness of consequences 
11.9 - Understands other people's point of view 
12.1 - Pro-criminal attitudes
risk_consideration.ogrs_score_guide: 50+ OGRS3 (Offender Group Reconviction Scale 3) over 2 years

exclusion.mental_health_problem_guide: Will be assesed if suitable after referral
